General.Name: Lanson BCC SA
General.Description: Lanson-BCC produces and sells wines in France and internationally. The company offers its products under the Champagne Lanson, Champagne Chanoine Frères, Champagne Besserat de Bellefon, Champagne Boizel, Champagne De Venoge, Champagne Philipponnat, Maison Burtin, and Domaine Alexandre Bonnet brand names. It distributes its products through mass retail stores, wine stores, gourmet restaurants, as well as through mail orders. The company was formerly known as Boizel Chanoine Champagne and changed its name to Lanson-BCC in 2010. Lanson-BCC was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Reims, France.
